message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $200. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $200 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that $200 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $160 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to get close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell it to you for $170. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget too, Alice. I'm willing to pay $165 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the negotiations, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $175. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand that you're making a final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $170 for it. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll make the deal.
